document_data.name: Skarmaen Alibakkar
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Skarmaen Alibakkar''' was a rather unpleasant noble of [[House Alibakkar]] who lived in the city of [[Trademeet]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Skarmaen was well-known for being both selfish and indolent.
document_data.Relationships: He was the third brother of [[Meisarch]] [[Erlranther Alibakkar]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Skarmaen sought out adventurers to help him in his family's feud against [[Lilith Lurraxol|Lady Lilith]] of [[Lurraxol|House Lurraxol]]. He wanted them to retrieve the ''[[mantle of Waukeen]]'' so that he could prove his family was involved with Trademeet's founding.
